articles.description: BBC Sport looks at some of the players that have been linked with moves before the Premier League transfer deadline on 2 February at 19:00 GMT.
articles.title: Who could move on before Premier League transfer deadline?

articles.description: Besiktas pay £11.2m to Roma for Tammy Abraham - as the Turkish club prepare to sell him to Aston Villa.
articles.title: Aston Villa: Besiktas pay £11.2m for Abraham - to sell him to Villa

articles.description: A 'Baggy Green' cap worn by Don Bradman during a series against India in 1947-48 is been sold for A$460,000 (£232,000) at auction.
articles.title: Don Bradman: Australian batter's Baggy Green cap sets record fee at auction

articles.description: Tournament organisers postpone the wheelchair events and will start play early on outside courts in anticipation of extreme heat in Melbourne on Tuesday.
articles.title: Australian Open 2026: Schedule altered with 42C heat expected on Tuesday

articles.description: MOTD pundit Danny Murphy explains how Manchester United earned their impressive win at Premier League leaders Arsenal, and how he feels the Gunners will react.
articles.title: Danny Murphy column: 'Another unbelievable result' - what is different about Man Utd now?

articles.description: The New England Patriots become the first team to book their spot in Super Bowl 60 after grinding out a 10-7 win at the Denver Broncos.
articles.title: NFL play-offs: New England Patriots reach Super Bowl 60 after beating Denver Broncos

articles.description: Novak Djokovic says Iva Jovic has "all the tools" to be world number one - but who is the 18-year-old who will face Aryna Sabalenka in the Australian Open quarter-finals?
articles.title: Australian Open 2026: Meet Iva Jovic the 'future number one' facing Aryna Sabalenka in last eight

articles.description: A decision on whether Pakistan will boycott next month's T20 World Cup is set to be made by early next week.
articles.title: 2026 T20 World Cup: Pakistan will make decision on boycott by early next week

articles.description: Captain Sione Tuipulotu says Scotland must believe they can win the 2026 Six Nations, despite low expectations following a difficult autumn.
articles.title: Six Nations: Scotland must believe they can win, says captain Sione Tuipulotu

articles.description: Steve Kerr says the Golden State Warriors' win at the Minnesota Timberwolves took place in a "sombre atmosphere" after the fatal shooting of an intensive care nurse by immigration agents in Minneapolis.
articles.title: NBA: Golden State Warriors win at Minnesota took place in 'sombre atmosphere' - Steve Kerr
